source_reference.text: Christian Marriage Advice: Why Won't God Fix My Marriage? (Video by ApplyGodsWord_MarkBallenger)

content_summary:
Why won't God fix your marriage if you are asking him to in your prayers? What Christian marriage advice are you missing? 

For the article on Christian marriage advice and why God won't fix your marriage, click here: http://applygodsword.com/why-wont-god...

Books and small group Bible studies by Mark Ballenger: 

*Intertwined: Our Happiness Is Tied to God’s Glory https://www.amazon.com/Intertwined-Ha...

The Ultimate Guide to Christian Singleness https://www.amazon.com/Ultimate-Guide...
